FIRST LIGHT PROTOCOL — ARECIBO-FORMAT PICTOGRAM
=======================================================
Dimensions : 23 columns × 73 rows = 1679 cells
Factoring  : 1679 = 23 × 73 (both prime — semiprime)
Reference  : Arecibo message (1974), 1679 bits (23×73),
             transmitted toward M13 at 2380 MHz.
This grid  : SENDER (human figure, left) → ARROW →
             RECEIVER (circle, right) + HANDSHAKE (wave)
Encoding   : 1 = signal present, 0 = signal absent
             Each row is exactly 23 characters.
=======================================================
